Global

Methods

connect(optionsopt, connectListeneropt) → {Client}

Create a connection to the WebSocket Server.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
options String | Object <optional>
 If options is a string, it is automatically parsed with url.parse().
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
host String <optional>
 localhost A domain name or IP address of the server.
port Number <optional>
 80|443 Port of remote server.
headers Object <optional>
 Headers to be sent to the server.
subProtocols String | Array <optional>
 The list of WebSocket sub-protocols.
connectListener function <optional>
 A one time listener for the 'connect' event.
Source:
  • websocket.js, line 35
Returns:
Type
Client

createServer(optionsopt, sessionListeneropt) → {Server}

Create a WebSocket Server.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
options Object <optional>
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
httpServer Object <optional>
 see Server#httpServer
autoAccept Boolean <optional>
 true see Server#autoAccept
sessionListener function <optional>
 A listener for the 'session' event.
Source:
  • websocket.js, line 12
Returns:
Type
Server
